events.name: ReturnInitiated
events.description: Capture the start of the return process.

events.name: ReturnApproved
events.description: System approves the return based on policy.

events.name: ReturnRejected
events.description: A return is rejected due to criteria not being met.

events.name: ReturnRefunded
events.description: Refund is issued after return is processed.

commands.name: InitiateReturn
commands.description: Capture the start of the return process.

commands.name: ApproveReturn
commands.description: System approves the return based on policy.

commands.name: RejectReturn
commands.description: A return is rejected due to criteria not being met.

commands.name: ProcessRefund
commands.description: Refund is issued after return is processed.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration to update inventory based on returned items.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerCommunication
integrationPoints.description: Notify customers about return status and refund.
